languages.text: {n}Мастер печатей удивленно изгибает бровь.{/n} "Вы в самом сердце {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Администратумского{/g} Дворца. Сотни тысяч префектов, ординатов, писарей, слуг и {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}сервиторов{/g} денно и нощно несут свою службу во благо Человечества и династии фон Валанциус, десятилетиями не покидая его пределы. Но — все познается в сравнении! На фоне целых миров, принадлежащих Адептус Администратум, сия обитель лишь жалкий винтик в священной машине {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Мастер печатей удивленно изгибает бровь.{/n} "Вы в самом сердце {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Администратумского{/g} Дворца. Сотни тысяч префектов, ординатов, писарей, слуг и {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}сервиторов{/g} денно и нощно несут свою службу во благо Человечества и династии фон Валанциус, десятилетиями не покидая его пределы. Но — все познается в сравнении! На фоне целых миров, принадлежащих Адептус Администратум, сея обитель — лишь жалкий винтик в огромной машине {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}".
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: {n}The Master of Seals raises her eyebrows in surprise.{/n} "You are in the very heart of the Palace of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}. Day and night, hundreds of thousands of prefects, ordinates, scribes, servants, and {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g} carry out their duties to Humanity and the von Valancius dynasty here, never setting foot outside its boundaries for decades at a time. But knowledge comes through comparison! There are entire worlds belonging to the Administratum, so this palace is but a humble cog in the blessed machine of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."
languages.original_text: {n}Мастер печатей удивленно изгибает бровь.{/n} "Вы в самом сердце {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Администратумского{/g} Дворца. Сотни тысяч префектов, ординатов, писарей, слуг и {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}сервиторов{/g} денно и нощно несут свою службу во благо Человечества и династии фон Валанциус, десятилетиями не покидая его пределы. Но — все познается в сравнении! На фоне целых миров, принадлежащих Адептус Администратум, сия обитель лишь жалкий винтик в священной машине {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}".

There are entire worlds belonging to the Administratum, so this palace is but a humble cog in the blessed machine of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

Day and night, hundreds of thousands of prefects, ordinates, scribes, servants, and {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g} carry out their duties to Humanity and the von Valancius dynasty here, never setting foot outside its boundaries for decades at a time. But knowledge comes through comparison! There are entire worlds belonging to the Administratum, so this palace is but a humble cog in the blessed machine of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: {n}印章大师惊讶地扬起了眉毛。{/n}“你身处{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}帝国内政部{/g}宫殿的最中心。在这里，成百上千位行政官、行政文员、抄录员、仆人与{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}机仆{/g}不舍昼夜地履行着对人类与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的神圣职责，几十年来从来都没有踏出过它的边界。不过，没有比较就没有差距。有些地方整个世界都属于内政部，而相比之下，这座宫殿不过是{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}这台受祝福的巨型机器中，一颗卑微而渺小的齿轮而已。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Master of Seals raises her eyebrows in surprise.{/n} "You are in the very heart of the Palace of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}. Day and night, hundreds of thousands of prefects, ordinates, scribes, servants, and {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g} carry out their duties to Humanity and the von Valancius dynasty here, never setting foot outside its boundaries for decades at a time. But knowledge comes through comparison! There are entire worlds belonging to the Administratum, so this palace is but a humble cog in the blessed machine of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}印章大师惊讶地扬起了眉毛。{/n}“你身处{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}帝国内政部{/g}宫殿的最中心。在这里，成百上千位行政官、行政文员、抄录员、仆人与{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}奴工{/g}不舍昼夜地履行着对人类与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的神圣职责，几十年来从来都没有踏出过它的边界。不过，没有比较就没有差距。有些地方整个世界都属于内政部，而相比之下，这座宫殿不过是{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}这台受祝福的巨型机器中，一颗卑微而渺小的齿轮而已。”
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: {n}La Maestra de Sellos arquea la ceja, sorprendida.{/n} «Se encuentra en el corazón del palacio del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}. Día y noche, cientos de miles de prefectos, ordenanzas, escribas, sirvientes y {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servidores{/g} ejecutan sus deberes hacia la humanidad y la dinastía von Valancius, llegando a permanecer en el interior del lugar durante décadas. ¡Pero el conocimiento es fruto de la comparación! Hay mundos enteros en manos del Administratum, por lo que este palacio es un simple engranaje de la bendita máquina que es el {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}».
languages.original_text: {n}The Master of Seals raises her eyebrows in surprise.{/n} "You are in the very heart of the Palace of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}. Day and night, hundreds of thousands of prefects, ordinates, scribes, servants, and {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g} carry out their duties to Humanity and the von Valancius dynasty here, never setting foot outside its boundaries for decades at a time. But knowledge comes through comparison! There are entire worlds belonging to the Administratum, so this palace is but a humble cog in the blessed machine of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}La Maestra de Sellos arquea la ceja, sorprendida.{/n} «Se encuentra en el corazón del palacio del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}. Día y noche, cientos de miles de prefectos, ordenanzas, escribas, sirvientes y {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servidores{/g} ejecutan sus deberes hacia la humanidad y la dinastía von Valancius, llegando a permanecer en el interior del lugar durante décadas. ¡Pero el conocimiento es fruto de la comparación! Hay mundos enteros en manos del Administratum, por lo que este palacio es un simple engranaje de la bendita máquina que es el {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}».
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: {n}印章長は驚いて片眉を上げる。{/n}「ここは{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}帝国行政局{/g}宮殿の、正に心臓部と言える場所です。昼も夜も、何十万人という総監、座標官、書記官、従者、そして{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}サーヴィター{/g}が人類とフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝のために己の聖務を果たしているのです。ここ何十年もの間、一度として敷地の外に出たことはありません。しかし知識は比較から生まれるものです！行政局に帰属する全ての星々が存在するならば、すなわちこの宮殿は{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}という祝福されし装置の歯車の歯にすぎないのです」
languages.original_text: {n}The Master of Seals raises her eyebrows in surprise.{/n} "You are in the very heart of the Palace of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}. Day and night, hundreds of thousands of prefects, ordinates, scribes, servants, and {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g} carry out their duties to Humanity and the von Valancius dynasty here, never setting foot outside its boundaries for decades at a time. But knowledge comes through comparison! There are entire worlds belonging to the Administratum, so this palace is but a humble cog in the blessed machine of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}印章長は驚いて片眉を上げる。{/n}「ここは{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}帝国行政局{/g}宮殿の、正に心臓部と言える場所です。昼も夜も、何十万人という総監、座標官、書記官、従者、そして{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}サーヴィター{/g}が人類とフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝のために己の聖務を果たしているのです。ここ何十年もの間、一度として敷地の外に出たことはありません。しかし知識は比較から生まれるものです！行政局に帰属する全ての星々が存在するならば、すなわちこの宮殿は{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}という祝福されし装置の歯車の歯にすぎないのです」
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: {n}Surprise, la maîtresse des sceaux hausse les sourcils.{/n} « Vous êtes au cœur du palais de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}. De jour comme de nuit, des centaines de milliers de préfets, commis, scribes, fonctionnaires et {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g} s'affairent en ces lieux au service de l'humanité et de la dynastie von Valancius, et ce sans jamais mettre le nez dehors de toute l'année. Mais tout est relatif, et comme l'Administratum possède des centaines de mondes, ce bel édifice n'est guère qu'un humble rouage dans la sainte machinerie de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Master of Seals raises her eyebrows in surprise.{/n} "You are in the very heart of the Palace of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}. Day and night, hundreds of thousands of prefects, ordinates, scribes, servants, and {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g} carry out their duties to Humanity and the von Valancius dynasty here, never setting foot outside its boundaries for decades at a time. But knowledge comes through comparison! There are entire worlds belonging to the Administratum, so this palace is but a humble cog in the blessed machine of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Surprise, la maîtresse des sceaux hausse les sourcils.{/n} « Vous êtes au cœur du palais de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}. De jour comme de nuit, des centaines de milliers de préfets, commis, scribes, fonctionnaires et {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g} s'affairent en ces lieux au service de l'humanité et de la dynastie von Valancius, et ce sans jamais mettre le nez dehors de toute l'année. Mais tout est relatif, et comme l'Administratum possède des centaines de mondes, ce bel édifice n'est guère qu'un humble rouage dans la sainte machinerie de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. »
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: {n}Die Meisterin der Siegel hebt überrascht die Augenbrauen.{/n} "Ihr befindet Euch im Herzen des Palastes des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}. Tag und Nacht erfüllen hier Hunderttausende von Präfekten, Ordinaten, Schreibern, Dienern und {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Servitoren{/g} ihre Pflichten für die Menschheit und die Dynastie von Valancius und setzen dabei über Jahrzehnte niemals auch nur einen Fuß vor die Tür. Wissen entsteht durch Vergleich! Ganze Welten gehören dem Administratum, und dieser Palast ist nur ein bescheidenes Zahnrad in der gesegneten Maschine des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g}."
languages.original_text: {n}The Master of Seals raises her eyebrows in surprise.{/n} "You are in the very heart of the Palace of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}. Day and night, hundreds of thousands of prefects, ordinates, scribes, servants, and {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g} carry out their duties to Humanity and the von Valancius dynasty here, never setting foot outside its boundaries for decades at a time. But knowledge comes through comparison! There are entire worlds belonging to the Administratum, so this palace is but a humble cog in the blessed machine of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

Tag und Nacht erfüllen hier Hunderttausende von Präfekten, Ordinaten, Schreibern, Dienern und {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Servitoren{/g} ihre Pflichten für die Menschheit und die Dynastie von Valancius und setzen dabei über Jahrzehnte niemals auch nur einen Fuß vor die Tür. Wissen entsteht durch Vergleich! Ganze Welten gehören dem Administratum, und dieser Palast ist nur ein bescheidenes Zahnrad in der gesegneten Maschine des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g}."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: {n}Mühür Üstadı, hayret içinde kaşlarını kaldırıyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g} Sarayı'nın kalbinin attığı yerdesiniz. Yüz binlerce prefekt, ordinat, kâtip, hizmetkâr ve {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}hizmetör{/g}; gece gündüz demeden İnsanlığa ve von Valancius hanedanlığına olan görevlerini yerine getiriyor, onlarca yıl Saray'ın dışına adım bile atmıyor. Ne var ki bilgi, mukayeseden doğar! Administratum'a ait olan koca koca dünyalar vardır; o yüzden de bu saray, {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g} denen kutsal makinenin sadece naçiz bir dişlisinden ibarettir."
languages.original_text: {n}The Master of Seals raises her eyebrows in surprise.{/n} "You are in the very heart of the Palace of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}. Day and night, hundreds of thousands of prefects, ordinates, scribes, servants, and {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g} carry out their duties to Humanity and the von Valancius dynasty here, never setting foot outside its boundaries for decades at a time. But knowledge comes through comparison! There are entire worlds belonging to the Administratum, so this palace is but a humble cog in the blessed machine of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."
